org.dinopolis.gpstool
Class Gpsylon

java.lang.Object
  org.dinopolis.gpstool.Gpsylon
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, GpsylonKeyConstants, MapNavigationHook, Positionable, PropertyChangeListener, StatusHook
public class Gpsylon
extends Object
implements PropertyChangeListener, GpsylonKeyConstants, MapNavigationHook, StatusHook, Positionable

This is an application that shows maps, tracks, gps position, etc. It heavily depends on its resources, as all default values are stored there. The information is organized and painted in layers.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Christof Dallermassl

Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_LOCATION

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_LOCATION
the key for the current location from the gps device. The value is a LatLonPoint object.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_HEADING

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_HEADING
the key for the heading from the gps device. Usually, you want to use PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_HEADING instead! The value is a Float object.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_HEADING

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_HEADING
the key for the heading either from the gps device or calculated from the last and the current location. This property is always triggered, even if the gps device does not send heading-information. The value is a Float object.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_SPEED

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_SPEED
the key for the speed from the gps device. Usually, you want to use PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_SPEED instead! The value is a Float object and the speed is in kilometers per hour.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_SPEED

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_CURRENT_SPEED
the key for the speed either from the gps device or calculated from the last and the current location. This property is always triggered, even if the gps device does not send speed-information. The value is a Float object and the speed is in kilometers per hour.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_ALTITUDE

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_ALTITUDE
the key for the altitude from the gps device. The value is a Float object and the altitude is given in meters.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_SATELLITE_INFO

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_SATELLITE_INFO
the key for the info of the gps satellites from the gps device. The value is an array of SatelliteInfo objects.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_POS_ERROR

public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_GPS_POS_ERROR
the key for the info of the gps position error. The value an GPSPositionError object.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
Parameters:

startSimulation

protected void startSimulation(LatLonPoint start,
                               LatLonPoint destination)
Sets the simulation parameters (start end destination point) and starts the simulation. It converts from LatLonPoints to GPSPositions. It does nothing, if the gps_data_processor_ is not a Simulation processor.

Parameters:
start - the start point
destination - the destination point

initializePluginArchitecture

protected void initializePluginArchitecture()
Initializes the plugin architecture (create class loader, add plugin directories, create service provider, etc.). The plugins itself are not created here!

initializePlugins

protected void initializePlugins()
Instantiates and Initializes the plugins that are found.

checkLockFiles

public void checkLockFiles(String[] lockfilenames)
Checks for the existence of any lock files (for serial devices, etc.). If there are any found, it opens a dialog box and asks the user what to do.

getDistanceOrSpeed

public static float getDistanceOrSpeed(float distance_or_speed)
Deprecated. use the UnitHelper class from the PluginSupport instead!

Returns the distance or speed converted from km to whatever unit that is currently chosen (miles, nautical miles).

Parameters:
distance_or_speed - in km
Returns:
the converted distance or speed.

getDistanceOrSpeedString

public static String getDistanceOrSpeedString(float distance)
Deprecated. use the UnitHelper class from the PluginSupport instead!

Returns a String that contains the distance formatted corresponding to the settings in the resource file. This includes the formatting of the number itself, the unit (metric, nautic or miles) and a suffix that correponds to the unit (km, mi, nmi).

Parameters:
distance -
Returns:
a String containing the formatted distance including the unit.

Deprecated. use the UnitHelper class from the PluginSupport instead!

Returns:
a String containing the formatted distance including the unit.

setMapCenter

public void setMapCenter(double latitude,
                         double longitude)
Sets the new center of the map.

Specified by:
setMapCenter in interface MapNavigationHook
Parameters:
latitude - The latitude of the new center of the map
longitude - The longitude of the new center of the map

reScale

public void reScale(float scale_factor)
Rescales the map by a given factor. A factor of 1.0 leaves the map unchanged. A factor greater 1.0 zooms in, a factor less than 1.0 zooms out.

Specified by:
reScale in interface MapNavigationHook
Parameters:
scale_factor - the scale factor.

setScale

public void setScale(float scale)
Rescales the map by to a given scale.

Specified by:
setScale in interface MapNavigationHook
Parameters:
scale - the scale

translateMapCenterRelative

public void translateMapCenterRelative(float factor_x,
                                       float factor_y)
Sets a new center for the map. A negative factor moves the center up or left, a postive factor down or right. A factor of 1.0 translates the center a complete height/width down or right.

Specified by:
translateMapCenterRelative in interface MapNavigationHook
Parameters:
factor_x - the horizontal factor to recenter the map.
factor_y - the vertical factor to recenter the map.

getMapProjection

public Projection getMapProjection()
Returns the currently used projection of the map. This projection may be used to calculate the latititude/longitude from screen coordinates and vice versa.

Specified by:
getMapProjection in interface MapNavigationHook
Returns:
the projection currently used.

Projection
